features: 🚗【4K/2.5K+1080P DASH CAM FRONT AND REAR】The dash camera for cars with 64GB card provide a 4K (3840*2160P)，2K（2156*1080） resolution front camera and a 1080P rear camera, the 4k dash cam helps you to read the key details like road signs, vehicle number plates, etc, protects you from potential accidents and liability issues and works well for cars, SUVs, jeeps.

👆【WIFI/SMART APP CONTROL】Just need to connect the car camera to your smartphone APP via WiFi and then you can use the "Viidure" app to view, playback, and manage the car dash cam on your IOS or Android devices. You can also download and edit videos in the app. With just one click you can share your travel scenery and wonderful moments with your friends and family.

🚕【RELIABLE WITNESS FOR ACCIDENT & 24 HOURS PARKING MODE】Variable sensitivity G-sensor can perfectly detects sudden shake and collision for dual dash cam front and rear, then emergency locks the footage to the event folder. Loop recording auto overwrites the oldest file when the card is full. Emergency video will activate the recording camera to record monitoring if there is a vehicle collision or movement of your vehicle during 24-hour parking monitoring, requires hardwire kit ASIN: B0CCY298Z6)

🚙【EXCELLENT NIGHT VISION DASH CAMERA FOR DRIVERS & FREE 64GB CARD】With the real WDR Image optimization tech and F1.8 aperture 7-glass lens, the dual dash cam is able to restore the true color of the object to the greatest extent during the day and night. Free 64GB card meets the daily file storage for the car dash camera.

✔【WHY WE USE TYPE-C FOR DASHCAM K9?】Compared with the traditional mini-USB interface, the Type C interface for dash cam K9 has no need to check insertion direction, and the type C interface with improved power supply capability, faster charging speed, and better Heat resistance will directly let you enjoy a superior product experience.

📞【WORRY-FREE WARRANTY FOR DASH CAM K9】Email our customer service and we will answer any of your questions/concerns for front and rear dash camera 4k, our experienced engineers and professional support teams provide 7x24Hrs comprehensive help for each customer about Car Camera Driving Recorder.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KQQ K9 4K DASH CAM FRONT AND REAR 1. Please make sure the front and rear cameras are properly connected before POWER ON the Screen(Please turn off the clear sticker of the cameras) 2. Please use the original accessories provided in the package to prevent compatibility issues when using other accessories. 3. Please use a Class 10 or higher speed card requiring 10MB/sec or more (maximum support 128GB, a 64GB TF card is included in the package). 4. Please format the micro SD card regularly, if locked videos take up a lot of capacity, make sure to release them. 5.Dash camera for cars when using the 24H parking monitor function, please select the time-lapse recording mode and the need for a special K9 hardwire kit，otherwise the car recorder will quickly drain your car's battery. 6. If your car is a truck or caravan you will need a longer cable 33ft/10m

Built-in WiFi & Viidure App With the built-in wifi, you can use the free Viidure app on your ios or Android devices. It is convenient for you to do the following operations. Control the dash cam easily: set camera settings, start or stop recording, and take pictures;Manage videos and images: view, download, and delete footage;Check GPS dataShare videos and images to social media after downloading. GPS Tracking & GPS Player（GPS not include） With the external GPS module, the camera records driving speed, route and location. You can view GPS logs via the GXplayer on your PC or via the Roadcam App on your phone! How to view GPS data? View on PC/Mac: Remove the memory card from the driving recorder, insert it into the PC with a card reader, install the software shown in the card, and now you can view GPS logs with the GXplayer.View on Roadcam App: Download the free Roadcam App on your phone, connect your phone to the dashboard camera's WiFi, download videos with GPS logs on the App, then you can view GPS logs in "album" on the App.
Loop Recording When the memory card is full The new Recording overwrites the oldest Recording Note: Locked videos will not be deleted

24-Hour parking monitoring During parking, the dashboard records continuously at a set frame rate, saving storage space on the TF card. It requires a hardwire kit to connect the dashboard to the car battery to power the dashboard when the engine is off. Monitor Time：Never, 1 hour, 2 hours, 5 hours, 10 hours and 24 hours. [Note:] The Monitor Time icon and Lapse Recording icon will only appear when the hardwire kit is connected. Built-in gravity sensor This device has a built-in G-Sensor with 3 levels of sensitivity: high, medium and low can be preset. If a car collision occurs, the device will automatically lock the special video file, which will not be overwritten and stored by the looped video, ensuring that the most important video evidence will not be lost (it is recommended to adjust the sensitivity to low)
Powerful night vision WDR technology help balance the light and get a clearer image. Everything is seen clearly, and it's easy and safe to drive at night，Let you go forward even in the dark.

Glued + sliding slot design Easy to take by sliding No need to worry about the risk of falling suction cups Upper and lower 170 degree angle adjustment left and right 360 degree angle adjustment Easy and quick installation

K9 K8 K23 T33 T33B wireless charging Front camera 4K 4K 2k 4K 1296P Rear Camera 1080P 1080P 1080P 1080P 1080P Memory card 64GB 64GB 64GB 64GB 64GB WiFi+APP ✓ ✓ GPS Support ✓ ✓ ✓ Parking monitor ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Emergency Recording ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Loop Recording ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Dash Cam for a Safer Driving Experience
reviews.reviewText: Introduction:I recently purchased and installed a dash cam in my vehicle, and I must say it has been a game-changer. The dash cam I chose is a remarkable piece of technology that offers numerous benefits and features. In this review, I would like to highlight its exceptional performance and the peace of mind it brings to my daily commutes.Impressive Video Quality:One of the standout features of this dash cam is its outstanding video quality. The high-definition resolution ensures that every detail on the road is captured with clarity. Whether it's recording during the day or at night, the dash cam delivers sharp and crisp footage, which is crucial for capturing license plates, road signs, and other important elements.Wide-Angle Lens:The wide-angle lens of this dash cam provides an extensive field of view, ensuring that nothing goes unnoticed. It effectively captures the entire road ahead, allowing for comprehensive documentation of any incidents or accidents. I particularly appreciate this feature as it gives me a sense of security, knowing that the dash cam has my back in case of any unforeseen events.Reliable Loop Recording:The loop recording feature of this dash cam is both convenient and reliable. It automatically overwrites the oldest footage with new recordings, ensuring that the memory card never gets full. This means I can rely on the dash cam to continuously record my journeys without having to worry about manually deleting or transferring files. It's a hassle-free solution that saves time and effort.G-Sensor and Emergency Recording:The built-in G-sensor is a crucial safety feature that automatically detects sudden impacts or collisions. When such an event occurs, the dash cam promptly locks and saves the current recording as an emergency file. This invaluable feature provides crucial evidence in case of accidents or disputes, ultimately aiding in insurance claims and legal proceedings.User-Friendly Interface:Setting up and operating this dash cam is a breeze, thanks to its user-friendly interface. The intuitive controls and menu navigation make it easy to customize settings, review footage, and access various features. Additionally, the dash cam's compact design seamlessly integrates into my vehicle without obstructing the driver's view.Conclusion:In conclusion, this dash cam has exceeded my expectations in terms of performance, reliability, and user-friendliness. Its exceptional video quality, wide-angle lens, loop recording, G-sensor, and intuitive interface have all contributed to a safer and more secure driving experience. I highly recommend this dash cam to anyone seeking to enhance their road safety and document their journeys effectively.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome dash camera so far!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely thrilled with the exceptional 4K resolution on both front and back cameras, making it a standout choice. The effortless installation, reliable suction on the glass, and the seamless functionality of the video playback app truly enhance the overall experience. Highly recommend this dash camera for its top-notch performance and user-friendly features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality. Great price
reviews.reviewText: Easy install. I like how the rear facing camera has a mount that pivots. It can be placed with either double side tape or screws. I purchased this model because it utilizes an app to view video files from the cam so that the SD card doesn't have to be ejected to view. The camera is small and hardly noticeable. Fits nicely between the windshield and the rear view mirror. I am very pleased with this product. I plan on purchasing another for my wife's vehicle. Definitely a great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars very good dashcam!
reviews.reviewText: Installed this camera in my 1998 F150. Installation and setup were simple with easy-to-follow instructions. Picture and video clear and easy to see, app easy to install and navigate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your Ultimate Travel Companion
reviews.reviewText: The Dash Cam exceeded my expectations in every way. With its remarkable video quality, wide-angle lens, user-friendly interface, and durable build, it has become an indispensable travel companion.This dash cam captures crystal-clear footage in high definition, ensuring no detail is missed day or night. Its wide-angle lens eliminates blind spots, providing comprehensive coverage of the road. Setting it up is a breeze, and features like loop recording and automatic event detection make it hassle-free.The built-in G-sensor automatically protects footage during collisions, while its durability withstands various weather conditions. With expandable storage, I never worry about running out of space. The team's exceptional customer support is an added bonus.In conclusion, the Dash Cam is a feature-packed and reliable device. Invest in this exceptional dash cam for unmatched peace of mind and capture the moments that matter most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend. Great 4K dashcam.
reviews.reviewText: Very nice dashcam. It works great. It was easy to install in my car. The power/data cord for the rear-facing camera is long enough to reach the rear bumper in my car with extra length to spare. The quality of the video image is exceptional. It’s easy to use and install. I’m impressed with this dashcam system and I highly recommend it to others looking for such a system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for the Money
reviews.reviewText: I was in the market for a new dash cam after my last one was damaged due to heat. After some time shopping around, I settled on this KQQ Dash Cam. Performance in the heat is great, and picture quality is crystal clear. I also like that you can sync with your phone and that it loop records. Additionally, the charging cable kit is long enough for me to loop it through the interior trim, which hides the cable away. Overall, great value for the money, and very easy to set up. Highly recommend for anyone getting into dash cams.
